ticket

Class TicketProducer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ticket.TicketProducer

  • public class TicketProducer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is meant to use the ElectronicTicket.TicketBuilder class to produce a list of tickets depending on how many seats are available in the train waggon. The tickets are filled with example data as depicted in the methods below. In addition the created voyagers are collected in a list of passengers that can be accessed by a getter method.

    All methods inside this class are static to provide direct access when invoking. Therefore the constructor is private so that no instances of this class can be created.

    • Method Detail

      • produceTickets

        public static void produceTickets()
        Produces tickets that will be registered to the ticket repository and creates instances with example data different for the left or the right side of the waggon. A ticket is produced for each seat the waggon offers.

        By default, invalid tickets are also produced to test the conductor.

      • produceTickets

        public static void produceTickets(boolean withInvalidTickets)
        Produces tickets that will be registered to the ticket repository and creates instances with example data different for the left or the right side of the waggon. A ticket is produced for each seat the waggon offers.
        Parameters:
        withInvalidTickets - a switch causing invalid tickets to be produced or not

      • produceInvalidTickets

        private static void produceInvalidTickets()
        Inserts two voyagers whose ticket information are incorrect. The intelligent conductor should recognize the invalidity of their tickets and remove the stowaways from the train (i.e. throwing them out).

      • buildTicket

        private static void buildTicket(Voyager voyager,
                                TravelClass category,
                                WaggonSeat seat,
                                Source srcLocation,
                                Destination destLocation)
        Builds an instance of a ticket by using the internal ElectronicTicket.TicketBuilder.
        Parameters:
        voyager - the voyager attached to the ticket
        category - the travel class attached to the ticket
        seat - the seat attached to the ticket
        srcLocation - the source location attached to the ticket
        destLocation - the destination location attached to the ticket

      • randomEnumConstant

        private static <E extends java.lang.Enum<E>> E randomEnumConstant(java.lang.Class<E> enumType)
        Selects randomly an enum constant out of the given enum enumType and returns it. Uses the random generator MersenneTwisterFast.
        Type Parameters:
        E - the type qualifier ensuring the class is a subclass of Enum<E>
        Parameters:
        enumType - the class object holding the enumeration type
        Returns:
        the enumeration constant of type E

      • areTicketsProduced

        public static boolean areTicketsProduced()
        Checks if the tickets were already produced once.
        Returns:
        true if the tickets were already produced, false otherwise.

      • getListOfPassengers

        public static java.util.List<Voyager> getListOfPassengers()
        Returns the list of passengers that is built during ticket production.
        Returns:
        the list of passengers
